---
name: "Slide Deck Standards"
description: "Rules for generating presentations and slide content."
applyTo: "slides/**/*.md,slides/**/*.js,slides/**/*.ts"
---
# Slide deck rules
- Start with an outline in slides/outline.md (audience, narrative arc, takeaways).
- Slides must be scannable: short headings, minimal text, strong structure.
- If generating a PPTX via code, include a build script and a README in slides/.
